ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Kunark Expansion
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Verant find out and nerf it :oP  ::: -=B=- ... From: jhenders@bogon.com  To: eqbards@onelist.com  Date: Wednesday,

:::tries to snatch up all the copies of that message before the folks at
Verant find out and nerf it :oP :::

-=B=-
-----Original Message-----
From: jhenders@... <jhenders@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, March 15, 2000 11:23 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Kunark Expansion


>From: jhenders@...
>
>On Wed, Mar 15/00, kim@... wrote:
>>
>> At L48 this combo was equivalent to a 32 hp/tick regen (33
>> hp/tick standing). With the entire party damaged (which is
>> almost always the case against the dragons), that means you're
>> healing 192 hp/6 seconds, or roughly the equivalent of a
>> superior heal every 18 seconds. And you never go OOM.
>
>Now that's going to be a taunt.
>
>--
> Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
